gobblin.runtime.listeners

Interface JobListener

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    CloseableJobListener
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractCloseableJobListener, AbstractJobListener, EmailNotificationJobListener, JobExecutionEventSubmitterListener, RunOnceJobListener

    public interface JobListener
    An interface for classes used for callback on job state changes.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void onJobCancellation(JobContext jobContext)
